message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_FV_VALIDITY_PERIOD_EMPTY
message.locale: Validity Period, %1n, must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_XFV_VALIDITY_PERIOD_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Validity Period must be entered if Validity Period Unit is entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_XFV_VALIDITY_PERIOD_UNIT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Validity Period Unit must be entered if Validity Period is entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_FV_TRAINING_CREDIT_VALUE_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: Value must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_XRV_TRAINING_SERVICE_ENDED
message.locale: Training Service, %1s, has ended, Credit cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_XRV_TRAINING_CREDIT_ALL_READY_EXIST_THIS_CATEGORY_TYPE
message.locale: Training Credit already exists for this provider category, %1s and type, %2s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_XRV_TRAINING_IS_CANCELLED_TRAINING_CREDIT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The Training, %1s, is Canceled, Training Credit cannot be added.
The Training, %1s, is Cancelled, Training Credit cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_XFV_PROVIDER_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Provider Type must be entered if Provider Category is entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGCREDIT_FV_VALIDITY_PERIOD_MUST_BE_GT_ZERO
message.locale: Validity Period, %1s, must be greater than zero.
